You spend most of your time looting or watching cutscenes. The looting is tiresome because you often can't go back to places after triggering a completely unnecessary door close\, making it extremely frustrating for completionists.Considering most of the 'game' is cutscenes and not much action\, you'd expect the story to be up to scratch\, just like you would in a movie. Nope\, the story is incredibly boring and uninspiring. Clearly written by a different team to the first game.The actual gameplay\, and there isn't a great deal of it\, is boring and sluggish. The controls just don't feel responsive. The combat isn't anything special and you're fighting mostly humans the whole game\, and some undead too.The only good thing to come out of this game I'd say\, is that it's now been made extremely obvious how bias the shill media are.
